title: Download speed is too slow in China.
body_html:
I tried to install pytorch in China. I tried pip or conda, both are two slow, only several kb/s, the download process can take a couple of days. After a while, the install process is terminated because of no response.

Is there any mirror in China? or can you add the installation package into pypi, so they can be automatically synchronized to the servers in China.

Thanks!
body_text:

Is there any mirror in China? or can you add the installation package into pypi, so they can be automatically synchronized to the servers in China.
Thanks!
body:
I tried to install pytorch in China. I tried pip or conda, both are two slow, only several kb/s, the download process can take a couple of days. After a while, the install process is terminated because of no response.

Is there any mirror in China? or can you add the installation package into pypi, so they can be automatically synchronized to the servers in China.

Thanks!
